title: THE SISTERS OF MERCY - A Slight Case of Overbombing (1993)
description:
ARTIST: The Sisters of Mercy
ALBUM / TITLE: A Slight Case of Overbombing
RELEASE YEAR / DATE: 1993
COUNTRY: UK
STYLE: Gothic Rock
LABEL: Merciful Release
DURATION: 73:41
FILE FORMAT: MP3
QUALITY: 192 kbps 

TRACKLIST:

01. Under the Gun
02. Temple of Love
03. Vision Thing
04. Detonation Boulevard
05. Doctor Jeep
06. More
07. Lucretia My Reflection
08. Dominion - Mother Russia
09. This Corrosion
10. No Time to Cry
11. Walk Away
12. Body and Soul


A Slight Case of Overbombing is collection of all A-sides of The Sisters of Mercy UK singles released since the band was signed to Time Warner. Non UK singles like "When You Don't See Me" aren't present, however "Vision Thing (12" Canadian Club Mix)" and "Detonation Boulevard (Radio Edit)", two North-American Promo singles are included. It was released on August 23, 1993, on the band's own label Merciful Release (under distribution contract with EastWest). All the tracks featured on this album are in reverse chronological order of release
